home.bio: A software engineer with professional experience in web and mobile applications

about.title: About
about.bio: A software engineer with professional experience in web and mobile applications. Led and participated in the project and development of applications for public and private companies in the most diverse segments, using languages and tools such as JavaScript, TypeScript, Vue.js, Nuxt, Drupal, PHP, Laravel, Node.js, and NativeScript. Holds a BS in Computer Science and is continually improving himself and studying new technologies.

consultantAtlas.title: Front-end Engineering Consultant
consultantAtlas.description:
• Mentoring and technical guidance to front-end engineers
  • Study and development of project improvements
  • Participation in the development of a component library using Lerna, TypeScript and Vue.js
  • Participation in the migration of public pages to a Nuxt project with a focus on SEO

frontAtlas.title: Front-end Engineer
frontAtlas.description:
Assignments in a squad:

  • Front-end development for a platform with more than 20 million monthly visits
  • Front-end responsible for the deployment process
  • Code review
  • Tracking and organization of tasks in Jira using Scrum

ceoNuxstep.title: CEO & Co-Founder
ceoNuxstep.description:
• Planning, development and deployment of web and mobile applications
  • Participation in the execution of IT infrastructure projects
  • Development of a plugin that integrates Spotify's SDK into NativeScript using TypeScript

internGmaes.title: Software Development Intern
internGmaes.description:
• Participation in the development of a web inventory system for the City Hall of Francisco Beltr√£o using Vue.js and Laravel
  • Planning and development of the new website of the Federal Council of Engineering and Agronomy (CONFEA) using Drupal
  • Development of an integration between the Nuvemshop e-commerce platform and SkyHub marketplace integrator using Nuxt and Node.js
  • Deploy of applications on Linux and Windows servers
